goosegame

Class PlayerList

  • java.lang.Object
    • goosegame.PlayerList

  • public class PlayerList
extends java.lang.Object
    list of the players of a "jeu de l'oie" game, it is assumed that no player are removed or added while game has begun (this could be secured by the Board object which controls this list.

    It is a circular list, successive calls to nextPlayer() produces the periodical series of players of the list.
